statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT sale_amount, product_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id IN (3, 6, 9);
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 7;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount, customer_id FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 456 AND sale_amount < 500 ORDER BY sale_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_quantity, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE order_quantity > 10;
SELECT order_date, product_id FROM SalesData WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_restock_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, order_date, order_quantity, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity < 50 ORDER BY last_restock_date
SELECT product_name, available_quantity, last_restock_date FROM Inventory WHERE last_restock_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT MAX(unit_price) AS max_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_price FROM SalesData

SELECT order_id, product_name, available_quantity, order_quantity * unit_price AS total_price FROM SalesData INNER JOIN Inventory ON SalesData.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_quantity FROM historical_sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_sales FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, product_id, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 500;

SELECT hd.product_id, SUM(hd.forecast_quantity) AS total_forecast_quantity, SUM(ir.replenishment_quantity) AS total_replenishment_quantity FROM demand_forecast hd LEFT JOIN inventory_replenishment ir ON hd.product_id = ir.product_id GROUP BY hd.product_id;
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sale_amount FROM historical_sales_data GROUP BY sale_date HAVING SUM(sale_amount) > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM product_inventory WHERE current_stock < 50 AND product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast INNER JOIN product_inventory ON demand_forecast.product_id = product_inventory.product_id WHERE predicted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(ordered_quantity) AS total_orders FROM replenishment_orders GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_orders > 500;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id=100;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_amount FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category FROM Products WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM Products INNER JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, forecast_amount FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_amount > 1000 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
